definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">setup_player_rotations</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:isSaluting</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="set_rotation"><field name="action">rotateAngleX</field><field name="modelRenderer">bipedHead</field><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.25</field></block></value><next><block type="set_rotation"><field name="action">rotateAngleX</field><field name="modelRenderer">bipedRightArm</field><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">50</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
